description:

Available Early July:
Welcome to 1314 E Montgomery Ave! This is a stunning 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom single family townhome offering 3 sun-soaked floors of interior living space.
Features include hardwood floors, central air, in-unit laundry, a large backyard, and beautiful finishes throughout. The entry vestibule welcomes you home into the common area boasting 2 front windows and a straight-through floor plan. The living room flows nicely into the dining area with the staircase to your left and then into the kitchen at the back. Here, you'll love the vaulted ceiling, ample cabinetry and storage space, sleek subway tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, built-in microwave, gas range, and refrigerator. The 2nd Floor offers a lovely bathroom with white subway tiling and a clawfoot tub / shower combo. There are 2 bedrooms on this level, the middle room is a little smaller, both offer good closet space and great natural light. Your luxurious primary suite makes up the entire 3rd Floor with abundant sunlight, a closet, and built-in shelves. The primary bathroom is complete with a contemporary floating vanity and gorgeous tiled shower stall. There's a dehumidifier and 1 window a/c unit included your lease; plus central air ensures comfort all year long.  You'll have an unfinished basement with washer / dryer and additional room storage. Don't forget to check out the sizable backyard, which is behind your neighbor's outdoor space and provides the perfect spot for entertaining guests in the summertime. Please note that all furniture can remain with the home if tenant wishes.

About The Neighborhood:
Located in the desirable Fishtown neighborhood offering nonstop restaurants, cafes, and bars. You’ll be just steps from the Market Frankford Subway Line into Center City and public transportation bus routes. Walkable to Penn Treaty Park, The Fillmore, Hetzell Playground, Brooklyn Bowl, & Rivers Casino. Neighborhood hotspots include Barcade, Johnny Brenda’s, Front Street Cafe, Frankford Hall, Murph’s, Weckerly’s Ice Cream, and countless more.
Lease Terms:
Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. (Generally, $500/dog and $250/cat). Please note that there is a 2 pet maximum. Strictly, no large dogs. Tenants responsible for: electricity, gas, cable/internet, and water. Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, credit history to be considered (i.e. no active collections), no evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history with on-time rental payments. Exceptions to this criteria may exist under the law and will be considered.

title: Stunning Bi-Level Loft in Bella Vista
description:
This one bedroom New York style loft has a true “wow” factor with its’ 18 foot high ceilings, two-story western facing window, exposed brick walls and a warm industrial-chic vibe throughout. When you step inside the combined living, kitchen and dining space you immediately notice how thoughtful design has seamlessly melded them together.
The kitchen is an L-shape design and smartly blended into the space with a cool geometric black and white backsplash that extends to the ceiling, floating shelves for extra storage and grounded by modern black cabinets. A retro-inspired black Galanz refrigerator provides a fun accent in this space. There is a smartly added pantry tucked away behind the kitchen with shelving for small appliance storage and even a dedicated space for your coats and shoes.
Between the kitchen and living areas there is ample space to place a dining table should you wish to have one. The living area is a perfect spot to lounge and enjoy stunning skyline views and evening sunsets beautifully displayed thanks to the two-story window. Up a custom iron stairway, you’ll find the bedroom space. This lofted bedroom has high ceilings showcasing the unit’s exposed steel beams and gets good natural light from the window below. It features recently refinished hardwood floors and extra space to place a wardrobe for clothing storage.
Next to the bedroom is a large spa-like bathroom with a walk-in glass stall shower featuring subtle iridescent mini mosaic wall tile, a soaking tub (perfect for some self-care time!) and two black floating vanities with storage. A stackable Maytag washer and dryer is in a closet next to the bathroom for convenience.
This unit is located in an ideal location for a Philly foodie, just two blocks to all the Italian Market has to offer including outdoor fun at Piazza di Bruno, dining at Fiorella’s, Villa di Roma, Roxanne and the many other restaurants and cafes located in the market. For shopping, it’s a short walk to Sprouts and Target at Lincoln Square and to all the stores and dining along the Passyunk Avenue corridor.
The unit is also close to public transportation at the Broad Street subway line, on the 4 & 45 bus routes and an easy drive along Washington Avenue to access I-95 and I-76. The building itself features a 24-hour doorperson, fully equipped fitness center, large community room with kitchen and even bike storage. There is plenty of permitted street parking on the streets surrounding the building and a loading zone in front of the main entrance to make it easy to unload groceries and other items.
No Pets Allowed
Listing provided by Compass Pennsylvania LLC

title: Large Center City Loft with Parking
description:
For a sophisticated renter looking for the perfect blend of luxury living and a central Logan Square location, look no further than this chic one bedroom loft with sprawling city views and covered garage parking located in a doorman building at 2200 Arch Street.
When you step inside this unit you are immediately awestruck by breathtaking Philly skyline views from the massive industrial-style window in the living area that floods the entire space with natural light throughout the day. In typical loft fashion, the living and kitchen spaces are combined, unified by gleaming mid-tone hardwood floors. This combined living space is sizeable enough to accommodate large scale furniture including a dining set with room to spare.
The modified galley-style kitchen features dark-colored cabinetry accented by sleek black granite countertops, cool glass tile backsplash and stainless steel appliances. The layout of the kitchen provides lots of cabinet space. The large kitchen island is ideal for casual at home dining and provides a focal gathering point when entertaining friends and family.
Up a small set of steps, off the main living area, the bedroom space is an open style with a walk-in closet big enough to make all your wardrobe storage dreams come true. The bathroom is located off the main hallway and features a neutral color scheme with gray tile, crisp white vanity with room for storage and a jetted tub (perfect way to get some self-care time in!). A closet located off the bathroom cleverly conceals a newer front-loading washer and dryer while providing extra storage space.
This particular unit even has a large storage area accessible under the bedroom space, a rare find in the city! The building also offers a fully equipped gym. Not only is this property a short walk to 30th Street Station, Suburban Station, UPENNs campus and the Hospital of the University of Pennsylvania, it is also close to many local favorites including Rosy’s Taco Bar, El Merkury and Butcher Bar, easy grocery shopping at the new Giant Market and Traders Joes. Additional greenspace for walking, biking and lounging is close by at the Schyulkill River Banks as well as at the Sunset Social rooftop just a short walk away over the Walnut Street Bridge.
Listing provided by Compass Pennsylvania LLC

This 1BR/1BA apartment is located on the top floor of a walkup in Rittenhouse Square. Features include an extra lofted space, plenty of natural light, exposed brick, and central air. title: Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia
description:
Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia, and you'll be blocks from the center of nightlife in Logan Square and Rittenhouse Square. Unit features modern kitchens, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washers and dryers, breakfast bars, pendant lighting, tile backsplashes, wood plank flooring throughout, walk-in closets. Stunning city and museum views are offered in a variety of floor plans! Mainstreet Market and Caf , featuring gourmet coffee and tea and much more! Fitness center with Technogym equipment, Queenax boxing gym, yoga/spin studio with indoor/outdoor workout space. It boasts Philadelphia's largest pools, an art studio, fitness center with boxing gym, yoga/spin studio, social lounge with demonstration kitchen, gourmet market and cafe, outdoor lounge with fire pit, 24-hour concierge, 24/7 package acceptance, resident shuttle service to Center City and University City and more. Make Whole Foods as your second kitchen conveniently located just 1 block away. Our apartments are within one mile of several institutions of higher education: Drexel University, Temple University, University of Penn, CHOP, Moore college of Arts, Community College of Philadelphia. You won't find a better building to live with amenities in the Fairmount Area. Park Towne Place includes 948 apartment and penthouse homes within four high-rise towers. The community is nestled between green acres on the Benjamin Franklin Parkway in the heart of Center City Philadelphia's Museum District. Park Town. ** Prices and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

title: Beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista
description:
Welcome to Carriage Mews, a beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista and the Meredith School Catchment, offering 1-car garage parking and a quiet shared courtyard. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, extra wide townhome has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Enter directly through the garage to the first floor featuring an open kitchen and dining area, a large pantry, a conveniently located half bath and a coat closet. The updated kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, quartz countertops, a nicely tiled backsplash, gas cooking, and an island for additional storage and counterspace. The spacious dining room (could also double as additional living space) features a wood burning fireplace and glass siding doors overlooking the beautiful well-manicured courtyard. Up the stairs is an oversized living room with hardwood floors, built-in cabinets, a ceiling fan and a large storage closet. This floor also features two nicely sized bedrooms both with closets and great natural light, a laundry closet, and a full bathroom with a tub. Continue up to the beautiful primary bedroom with south facing sliding glass doors to the Juliette Balcony, a wall of closets and access to your private bathroom with a tub and stall shower. Off the bedroom is a bonus living space and additional closets, great for a home office, playroom or an additional lounging area. Lastly, exit out to the private deck with tree top views, perfect for relaxing with a good book. Many recent updates: new Anderson doors & noise cancelling windows (2019), HVAC (2021), washer & dryer (2017), kitchen appliances (2019), and more! Plenty of storage throughout the home as well as in the garage. Located on a quiet street just off Cianfrani Park. Quick walk to Whole Foods, ACME, the Italian Market and some of the city’s best restaurants. Immediate move-in available.
705-11 Pemberton St #711

title: Huge Queen Village House with Garage in Meredith Catchment
description:
This is a beautiful brick townhome located in the Meredith catchment and highly sought after Independence Court community in the heart of Queen Village. This 3 bedroom/3.5 bathroom home has an attached PRIVATE GARAGE and almost 2,900 square feet of living space.
As you walk into the entryway, you are greeted with custom board and batten millwork, a large under stairs closet as well as an oversized double closet for storing coats and shoes. The hallway leads to the back room, currently being used as a combination den and office with a large outdoor patio, ready for grilling and entertaining. This room showcases built-in bookshelves, a feature wall with mushroom wood from Kennett Square and newly installed historic glass panel doors.
Rounding out the first floor is a powder room and direct inside access to the one car attached garage. The garage is finished with an upgraded epoxy floor and a custom wall storage hanging solution.
Heading upstairs to the second floor you are greeted by the gorgeous updated kitchen with new GE Café appliances, beautiful green cabinets, shiplap walls and a large island for entertaining with plenty of seating and new pendant lighting. The kitchen is open to the dining area with access to a large balcony, and flows into the welcoming family room space featuring high ceilings, a cozy fireplace and tons of natural light.
The third floor has two nicely sized bedrooms, one of which has an en-suite bathroom and both with large double closets. This floor also has a full bathroom with tub/shower combination and laundry space with custom Elfa storage and newer washer/dryer.
The entire fourth floor is an expansive primary suite with a private deck, two walk-in closets, and a sitting room/nook, which is currently being used as an office. The spa-like primary bathroom features custom millwork and stone tile work, a soaking tub, glass shower with subway tile walls, built-in linen closet and dual vanity.
Everything you could ever want in a home including plenty of entertaining space, three separate outdoor areas, dual zone Heat/AC, modern upgrades throughout and private garage parking! All this within the desirable Queen Village neighborhood, steps away from Philadelphia Java, For Pete’s Sake, Royal Izakaya, Famous 4th Street Deli and more! Walk to the Penn’s Landing waterfront, the Sunday Farmers Market at Headhouse Square, and find even more local shopping, yoga and pilates studios, dog parks and cafes with easy access to I-95, bridges to NJ and the Philadelphia airport.
No Pets Allowed
Listing courtesy of Compass Pennsylvania LLC

title: Spacious 3 Bedroom + Den in Fishtown
description:
Available NOW | Leasing Special: $2,095/month for a 12 month lease; or $1,995/month for a 16 month lease.
This is a wonderful 3 bedroom + Den / 1.5 bathroom featuring hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, exposed brick walls, laundry in-unit, central air, outdoor space, and more! The main living area welcomes you home with a large window for natural light and a ceiling fan for year-round comfort. Your kitchen is towards the back boasting counter seating, granite countertops, and a full lineup of stainless steel appliances. There's a lovely powder room with sliding barn door to ensure that hosting is a breeze!
Continue upstairs to the 2nd level to view the primary bedroom, full bathroom, and den. The primary suite is large enough to fit a king-sized bed and is equipped with gorgeous bay windows, built-in closet with mirrors, and a ceiling fan. Your bathroom is beautiful and mostly tiled with a lighted vanity and bathtub / shower combo. The T-shaped den would make a great office space or reading nook and offers abundant sunlight - perfect for your plants!
Head to the 3rd level featuring 2 more bedrooms with hardwood floors, ceiling fans, closet space, and natural sunlight. 1 of these bedrooms has a beautiful exposed brick wall for an elevated atmosphere. There's an unfinished basement with your in-unit laundry and ample storage space, plus a back patio for enjoying the warmer months!
About The Neighborhood: Fishtown offers some of the city’s best restaurants, nightlife, and entertainment options. Close proximity to I-95 and public transportation bus routes for an easy commute. Walkable to the lovely Penn Treaty Park, Rivers Casino, The Fillmore, Brooklyn Bowl, and Fabrika. Neighborhood favorites include Barcade, Frankford Hall, Johnny Brenda’s, Garage Fishtown, Murph’s, Harriet’s Bookshop, Love & Honey Fried Chicken, Weckerly’s Ice Cream, and countless more!
Listing is provided by JG Real Estate

title: New fully rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic distri
description:
Welcome to 1924 Spruce St! Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood, these new fully rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic district. The building has been home to prominent Philadelphia families such as Dr. John Hooker Packard, one of the most prominent American surgeons of the late 19th century; and the Philadelphia lawyer, Earl B. Putnam. Later covered to apartments in 1945, the most recent renovation was finalized in October 2022. The building holds eight (8) stunning brand-new units offering high-end appliances, including trash compactors, elevator access and lovely views of Center City. There are a variety of floor plans available for those seeking 1 to 3 bedrooms and you won't have to worry about laundry, as each apartment has a wash/ dryer in the unit. With so many attractions nearby, this location is the epitome of ideal: steps away from Rittenhouse Park, Starbucks, restaurants, shopping, and so much more. Transportation is a breeze, with countless bus routes around the corner and just a quick stroll to the BSL. *pictures may be of similar unit*

title: Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium
description:
Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium. Located at 1600 Arch Street in the heart of Center City Philadelphia, Unit 1010 is an exceptional studio apartment with premium finishes and fixtures. The apartment contains a washer/dryer, dishwasher, ample pantry space, two closets, hardwood flooring, a high ceiling, and a modernized kitchen and bathroom. The Phoenix boasts a 24-hour concierge, valet parking, curated amenity space, including a state-of-the-art fitness center and weight room, a resident lounge with event space, a conference room, a bike storage room, and a spacious outdoor terrace with stunning views. Additional amenities include a full-service restaurant (Tir Na Nog Irish Bar and Grill), Starbucks, WSFS Bank, and a recently announced grab-and-go mart on the concourse level. The Phoenix is situated near some of the finest parks, restaurants, and shopping Philadelphia has to offer, with City Hall and Dilworth Park directly across the street. It is conveniently located with elevator access to Suburban Station and minutes from major thoroughfares I-95 and I-76. Tenant responsible for utilities. One-time move-in/move-out fee of $400. Valet parking and storage available for additional fees.
